summary: The class models a controlled‑RZ (CRZ) quantum gate, a two‑qubit diagonal operation that applies a Z‑axis rotation to the target qubit conditioned on the control qubit being in the |1⟩ state. It supplies the gate’s matrix definition, inversion logic and integration with Qiskit circuits.
business_intent: Provide a reusable component that lets developers add conditional phase‑shift operations to quantum circuits, supporting algorithm design, simulation and hardware execution within the Qiskit framework.
